100: Basic / Task can be done
//- - - - - - - - -//
- [ ] foo
- [x] bar
//- - - - - - - - -//
<ul>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> foo</li>
<li data-task="x"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> bar</li>
</ul>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


101: Basic / Task can have subtasks
//- - - - - - - - -//
- [x] foo
  - [ ] bar
  - [x] baz
- [ ] bim
//- - - - - - - - -//
<ul>
<li data-task="x"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> foo
<ul>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> bar</li>
<li data-task="x"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> baz</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> bim</li>
</ul>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


102: Basic / Not a task
//- - - - - - - - -//
- test[x]=[x]
//- - - - - - - - -//
<ul>
<li>test[x]=[x]</li>
</ul>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


103: Basic / Task may contain anything
//- - - - - - - - -//
+ [x][x]
//- - - - - - - - -//
<ul>
<li data-task="x"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> [x]</li>
</ul>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


104: Basic / Task can be inside blockquote
//- - - - - - - - -//
> - [ ] foo
> - [x] bar
//- - - - - - - - -//
<blockquote>
<ul>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> foo</li>
<li data-task="x"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> bar</li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


105: Basic / Task can be inside multi-level blockquote
//- - - - - - - - -//
> > - [ ] foo
> > - [x] bar
//- - - - - - - - -//
<blockquote>
<blockquote>
<ul>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> foo</li>
<li data-task="x"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> bar</li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
</blockquote>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


106: Basic / Task can be inside numbered list
//- - - - - - - - -//
1. [ ] foo
2. [x] bar
//- - - - - - - - -//
<ol>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> foo</li>
<li data-task="x"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> bar</li>
</ol>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


107: Basic / Task can be inside a callout - TODO
//- - - - - - - - -//
> [!info]
>
> - [ ] foo
> - [x] bar

> [!faq]- Foldable and closed by default.
> - [ ] foo
> - [x] bar

> [!question]
> > [!todo]+ Foldable and open by default.
> > - [ ] foo
> > - [x] bar
//- - - - - - - - -//
<blockquote>
<p>[!info]</p>
<ul>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> foo</li>
<li data-task="x"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> bar</li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>[!faq]- Foldable and closed by default.</p>
<ul>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> foo</li>
<li data-task="x"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> bar</li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>[!question]</p>
<blockquote>
<p>[!todo]+ Foldable and open by default.</p>
<ul>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> foo</li>
<li data-task="x"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> bar</li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
</blockquote>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


108: Basic / Task can't be inside an HTML comment
//- - - - - - - - -//
<!-- - [ ] foo -->
- <!-- [x] bar -->

<!--

- [ ] foo
- [x] bar

-->
//- - - - - - - - -//
<!-- - [ ] foo -->
<ul>
<li>
<!-- [x] bar -->
</li>
</ul>
<!--

- [ ] foo
- [x] bar

-->
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


109: Basic / Task can't be inside an Obsidian comment - TODO
//- - - - - - - - -//
%% - [ ] foo %%
- %% [x] bar %%

%%

- [ ] foo
- [x] bar

%%
//- - - - - - - - -//
<p>%% - [ ] foo %%</p>
<ul>
<li>%% [x] bar %%</li>
</ul>
<p>%%</p>
<ul>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> foo</li>
<li data-task="x"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> bar</li>
</ul>
<p>%%</p>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


110: Basic / Task can't contain inline HTML comments
//- - - - - - - - -//
- <!-- BAD --> [ ] foo
- [x] <!-- OK --> bar
//- - - - - - - - -//
<ul>
<li>
<!-- BAD --> [ ] foo
</li>
<li data-task="x"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> <!-- OK --> bar</li>
</ul>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


111: Basic / Task can't contain inline Obsidian comments
//- - - - - - - - -//
- %% BAD %% [ ] foo
- [x] %% OK %% bar
//- - - - - - - - -//
<ul>
<li>%% BAD %% [ ] foo</li>
<li data-task="x"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> %% OK %% bar</li>
</ul>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


112: Basic / Task can't be inside a code block
//- - - - - - - - -//
```
- [ ] foo
- [x] bar
```
//- - - - - - - - -//
<pre><code>- [ ] foo
- [x] bar
</code></pre>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


200: Prop / Only task have properties
//- - - - - - - - -//
- Item with wrong date ğŸ“… 2023-02-29
- Item with extra   spaces   ğŸ“…   2000-12-31
- [ ] Task with wrong date ğŸ“… 2023-02-29
- [ ] Task with extra   spaces   ğŸ“…   2000-12-31
//- - - - - - - - -//
<ul>
<li>Item with wrong date ğŸ“… 2023-02-29</li>
<li>Item with extra   spaces   ğŸ“…   2000-12-31</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task with wrong date</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task with extra   spaces ğŸ“… 2000-12-31</li>
</ul>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


201: Prop / Valid properties renders with single space
//- - - - - - - - -//
- [ ] Lowestâ¬   
- [ ] LowğŸ”½
- [ ] Medium   ğŸ”¼
- [ ] Highâ«
- [ ] HighestğŸ”º
- [ ] Dependency 1ğŸ†”1
- [ ] Dependency 2   ğŸ†”  abc
- [ ] Dependent oneâ›”1
- [ ] Dependent two   â›”   def,2
- [ ] Task 1 ğŸ“… 2000-01-01   
- [ ] Task 2 â³2000-01-02
- [ ] Task 3ğŸ›« 2000-01-03
- [ ] Task 4â•2000-01-04
- [ ] Task   5   âœ…   2000-01-05
- [ ] Task   âŒ   2000-01-06   6   âŒ   2000-01-06
- [ ] Recurrning   ğŸ”   every week on Monday,Tuesday
- [ ] Recurrning stopğŸ”every day
- [ ] On completion   ğŸ   KEep
- [ ] On completionğŸdelete
//- - - - - - - - -//
<ul>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Lowest â¬</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Low ğŸ”½</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Medium ğŸ”¼</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> High â«</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Highest ğŸ”º</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Dependency 1 ğŸ†” 1</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Dependency 2 ğŸ†” abc</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Dependent one â›” 1</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Dependent two â›” def,2</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 1 ğŸ“… 2000-01-01</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 2 â³ 2000-01-02</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 3 ğŸ›« 2000-01-03</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 4 â• 2000-01-04</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task   5 âœ… 2000-01-05</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task   âŒ   2000-01-06   6 âŒ 2000-01-06</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Recurrning ğŸ” every week on Monday,Tuesday</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Recurrning stop ğŸ” every day</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> On completion ğŸ keep</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> On completion ğŸ delete</li>
</ul>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


202: Prop / Invalid properties are removed
//- - - - - - - - -//
- [ ] Task 1   ğŸ“… 2023-02-29
- [ ] Task 2   â³ 2023-02-29
- [ ] Task 3   ğŸ›« 2023-02-29
- [ ] Task 4   â• 2023-02-29
- [ ] Task 5   âœ… 2023-02-29
- [ ] Task 6   âŒ 2023-02-29
- [ ] Task 7   ğŸ unknown
//- - - - - - - - -//
<ul>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 1</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 2</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 3</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 4</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 5</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 6</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 7</li>
</ul>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


203: Prop / Extra properties are removed
//- - - - - - - - -//
- [ ] Prio â¬ ğŸ”½ ğŸ”¼ â« ğŸ”º
- [ ] Dependency ğŸ†” abc ğŸ†” def
- [ ] Dependent â›” abc â›” def
- [ ] Task 1 ğŸ“… 2024-01-01 ğŸ“… 2024-01-02
- [ ] Task 2 â³ 2024-02-01 â³ 2024-02-02
- [ ] Task 3 ğŸ›« 2024-03-01 ğŸ›« 2024-03-02
- [ ] Task 4 â• 2024-04-01 â• 2024-04-02
- [ ] Task 5 âœ… 2024-05-01 âœ… 2024-05-02
- [ ] Task 6 âŒ 2024-06-01 âŒ 2024-06-02
- [ ] Recurring ğŸ” every mon,tue! ğŸ” every day
- [ ] On completion ğŸ keep ğŸ delete
- [ ] Invalid first ğŸ“… 2023-02-29 ğŸ“… 2024-01-01
//- - - - - - - - -//
<ul>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Prio â¬</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Dependency ğŸ†” abc</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Dependent â›” abc</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 1 ğŸ“… 2024-01-01</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 2 â³ 2024-02-01</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 3 ğŸ›« 2024-03-01</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 4 â• 2024-04-01</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 5 âœ… 2024-05-01</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Task 6 âŒ 2024-06-01</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Recurring ğŸ” every mon,tue!</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> On completion ğŸ keep</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Invalid first</li>
</ul>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


204: Prop / All valid properties must be at the end of line
//- - - - - - - - -//
- [ ] Tag   ğŸ”º   #tag'+;=[\\]`~   ğŸ“… 2024-01-02
- [ ] BlockID   ğŸ”º   ğŸ“… 2024-01-02   ^Block-1
- [ ] HTML Comments   ğŸ”º   <!--BAD-->   ğŸ“…   2024-01-02
- [ ] Obsidian Comments   ğŸ”º   %%BAD%%   ğŸ“…   2024-01-02
- [ ] Extra   ğŸ”º   text   ğŸ“… 2024-01-02
- [ ] No arg 1   ğŸ”º   ğŸ†”   ğŸ“… 2024-01-02
- [ ] No arg 2   ğŸ”º   â›”   ğŸ“… 2024-01-02
- [ ] Bad arg 1   ğŸ”º   ğŸ†” 1,2   ğŸ“… 2024-01-02
- [ ] Bad arg 2   ğŸ”º   â›” 1:2   ğŸ“… 2024-01-02
- [ ] Bad arg 3   ğŸ”º   ğŸ“… 2024/01/02   ğŸ“… 2024-01-02
- [ ] Bad arg 4   ğŸ”º   â³ 2024/01/02   ğŸ“… 2024-01-02
- [ ] Bad arg 5   ğŸ”º   ğŸ›« 2024/01/02   ğŸ“… 2024-01-02
- [ ] Bad arg 6   ğŸ”º   â• 2024/01/02   ğŸ“… 2024-01-02
- [ ] Bad arg 7   ğŸ”º   âœ… 2024/01/02   ğŸ“… 2024-01-02
- [ ] Bad arg 8   ğŸ”º   âŒ 2024/01/02   ğŸ“… 2024-01-02
- [ ] Bad arg 9   ğŸ”º   ğŸ” every mon:tue   ğŸ“… 2024-01-02
- [ ] Bad arg 0   ğŸ”º   ğŸ 1   ğŸ“… 2024-01-02
//- - - - - - - - -//
<ul>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Tag ğŸ”º#tag'+;=[\]`~ ğŸ“… 2024-01-02</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> BlockID ğŸ”º ğŸ“… 2024-01-02^Block-1</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> HTML Comments   ğŸ”º   <!--BAD--> ğŸ“… 2024-01-02</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Obsidian Comments   ğŸ”º   %%BAD%% ğŸ“… 2024-01-02</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Extra   ğŸ”º   text ğŸ“… 2024-01-02</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> No arg 1   ğŸ”º   ğŸ†” ğŸ“… 2024-01-02</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> No arg 2   ğŸ”º   â›” ğŸ“… 2024-01-02</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Bad arg 1   ğŸ”º   ğŸ†” 1,2 ğŸ“… 2024-01-02</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Bad arg 2   ğŸ”º   â›” 1:2 ğŸ“… 2024-01-02</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Bad arg 3   ğŸ”º   ğŸ“… 2024/01/02 ğŸ“… 2024-01-02</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Bad arg 4   ğŸ”º   â³ 2024/01/02 ğŸ“… 2024-01-02</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Bad arg 5   ğŸ”º   ğŸ›« 2024/01/02 ğŸ“… 2024-01-02</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Bad arg 6   ğŸ”º   â• 2024/01/02 ğŸ“… 2024-01-02</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Bad arg 7   ğŸ”º   âœ… 2024/01/02 ğŸ“… 2024-01-02</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Bad arg 8   ğŸ”º   âŒ 2024/01/02 ğŸ“… 2024-01-02</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Bad arg 9   ğŸ”º   ğŸ” every mon:tue ğŸ“… 2024-01-02</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Bad arg 0   ğŸ”º   ğŸ 1 ğŸ“… 2024-01-02</li>
</ul>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


205: Prop / Parsing only first line
//- - - - - - - - -//

- [ ] Line 1   ğŸ”º
  Line 2   ğŸ”º
- [ ] Emphasis _1   ğŸ”º
  Line_ 2   ğŸ”º

* [ ] Paragraph 1   ğŸ”º

  Paragraph 2   ğŸ”º

//- - - - - - - - -//
<ul>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Line 1 ğŸ”ºLine 2   ğŸ”º</li>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Emphasis <em>1 ğŸ”ºLine</em> 2   ğŸ”º</li>
</ul>
<ul>
<li data-task="">
<p><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Paragraph 1 ğŸ”º</p>
<p>Paragraph 2   ğŸ”º</p>
</li>
</ul>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//


206: Prop / All
//- - - - - - - - -//
- [ ]â¬ğŸ”½ğŸ”¼â«ğŸ”ºğŸ†”1â›”1ğŸ“…2000-01-01â³2000-01-02ğŸ›«2000-01-03â•2000-01-04âœ…2000-01-05âŒ2000-01-06âŒ2000-01-07ğŸ”everyMon,TueğŸ”everydayğŸKEepğŸdelete
//- - - - - - - - -//
<ul>
<li data-task=""><input disabled="" type="checkbox">  â¬ ğŸ†” 1 â›” 1 ğŸ“… 2000-01-01 â³ 2000-01-02 ğŸ›« 2000-01-03 â• 2000-01-04 âœ… 2000-01-05 âŒ 2000-01-06 ğŸ” everyMon,Tue ğŸ keep</li>
</ul>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//
